about_the_game:
inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a cozy narrative-driven simulation game about connection, nostalgia, and the quiet beauty of daily life.

Play as Makoto Hayakawa, a college student who finds herself behind the counter of a small-town convenience store in a colourful setting inspired by early 1990s Japan.

Discover joy and wonder hidden behind the daily routine of a konbini worker, explore every nook and cranny around the store, and help your customers navigate their lives in branching conversations with meaningful choices!

Key Features

Meditative store management simulation

Find joy in daily routine! Revise the stock, plan which products to get to the sales floor, and order delivery for goods in demand.

Branching dialogues with meaningful choices 

Explore a variety of conversational options chatting with a diverse cast of characters. Consult your customers, listen to their stories, and discover many secrets of a small-town life.

Nostalgic aesthetics of the early 1990s

Enjoy a deeply authentic reality of the early 1990s Japan-inspired setting with its soft visuals, warm lighting, and vintage touches creating a calming atmosphere that feels like home.

Soothing ASMR experience

From the rustle of packaging and clinks of canned goods, to the gentle raindrops on the storefront, let the soft ambience of the konbini wrap around you in a deeply immersive soundscape.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or for Intel Macs
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: M1Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated GPU with 4GB video RAM or more
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

name: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 / Radeon HD 7950 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Based on Low graphics settings. Dedicated GPU required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / Radeon R9 390 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Based on High/Ultra graphics settings. Dedicated GPU required, SSD recommended.

short_description: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a third-person single-player simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and see how choices you make impact their lives!
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Japanese*, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
